conformance:
This is the only conformance class defined for this part of ISO 10303. It can be combined with any of the conformance options listed below.
The conformance option Activity provides the capability to a define typical and individual activities with properties and to relate them to other objects.
The conformance option Advanced boundary representation provides the capability to represent the shape of a product by three dimensional topologically bounded solids with elementary and free form surfaces and edges.
The conformance option Alias identification provides the capability to add additional alias IDs to Parts and other objects in addition to the default one of these objects.
The conformance option Alternate product and assembly component substitution provides the capability to define products as potential replacements for other products and the substitution of components in an assembly by components of other types.
The conformance option Approval provides the capability to represent planned and actual approvals.
The conformance option Contextual shape positioning provides the capability for the representation of assemblies with geometric transformation data of the components.
The conformance option Contextual shape positioning provides the capability for the representation of assemblies with components of flexible material whose shape depend on the usage within the assembly. Example1: The shape of parts made out of rubber often differs when used as components in an assembly from the original shape. Example2: The shape of a flexible cable or tube within an assembly.
The conformance option Associative draughting provides the capability to to associate annotation elements that presents dimensions or draughting callouts of a draughting model with elements of the shape of a product.
The conformance option Basic assembly provides the capability to define simple assembly structures without re-use of assembly components for different variants or versions and without effectivity and configuration control of the used parts and components.
The conformance option Basic callout without associativity provides the capability to define callouts, consisting of text or symbols, leader, direction or projection curve and terminator symbols.
The conformance option Basic classification provides the capability to define classes and to relate elements of product data to these classes.
The conformance option Basic document provides the capability to identify documents, versions and different views of a documents and to relate them to external files and and to product data.
The conformance option Basis product property provides the capability to represent simple properties of products, consisting of the property type, property value and the underlying unit.
The conformance option Basic text and curve presentation provides the capability to represent text together with styling information for pre-defined or externally defined fonts.
The conformance option Certification provides the capability to assign certifications to product data.
The conformance option Colours and layers provides the capability to group presentation elements, define layers and assign colours.
The conformance option Complex product property provides the capability to share and exchange properties which may be base properties, which may be qualified or have some specified uncertainty, or a property which may be an aggregate of other properties.
The conformance option Composite materials provides the capability to identify materials and to represent the chemical composition, material properties and surface characteristics of products.
The conformance option Compound shape representation provides the capability to
The conformance option Constructive solid geometry 3d provides the capability to represent the shape of a product by Constructive Solid Geometry (CSG) conveyed by solid models, and the structural information is communicated through acyclic graphs.
The conformance option Construction geometry provides the capability to
The conformance option Contract and project provides the capability to represent contract and project information.
The conformance option Curve swept solid provides the capability to represent the shape of a product by a three dimensional solids with a fixed cross-section along a centre curve with orientation. The cross-section may be either circular or any other form. The intended usage is to represent the shape of cables or tubes.
The conformance option Date and time provides the capability to assign a date or a date with time to some other objects in user defined or predefined roles.
The conformance option Document structure and properties provides the capability to describe hierarchies of documents, classes of document and properties of document.
The conformance option Edge based wireframe provides the capability to represent the shape of a product by a three-dimensional wireframe model whose curves are topologically bounded.
The conformance option Effectivity provides the capability to define the effectivity of items according to the date, time interval, lot or serial number.
The conformance option Elementary boundary representation provides the capability to represent the shape of a product by three dimensional topologically bounded solids with elementary surfaces and edges.
The conformance option Enhanced assembly provides the capability to define complex assembly and collection structures including reuse of the same assembly components for assemblies of different variants and versions.
The conformance option Event and time interval provides the capability to
The conformance option Extended classification provides the capability to define classification systems with attributes and to refer to part library classification services.
The conformance option External library provides the capability to link product data with externally defined library and dictionary services.
The conformance option External model provides the capability to to link external geometry models that may be based on standard or proprietary formats with parts and other kinds of products.
The conformance option Faceted boundary representation provides the capability to represent the shape of a product by three dimensional topologically bounded solids with planar surfaces with explicit edge-curves.
The conformance option Geometric placement provides the capability to to place the occurrence of a part or a physical breakdown element with another physical breakdown element.
The conformance option Information rights provides the capability to represent rights concerning the access and use of information.
The conformance option GD&T presentation provides the capability for the presentation of Geometric Dimensioning and Tolerancing information of the shape of a product.
The conformance option GD&T presentation with association provides the capability for the associated presentation and representation of Geometric Dimensioning and Tolerancing information of the shape of a product.
The conformance option GD&T representation provides the capability for the representation of Geometric Dimensioning and Tolerancing information of the shape of a product.
The conformance option Geometrically bounded surface provides the capability to represent the shape of a product by three-dimensional surfaces that are geometrically bounded.
The conformance option Geometrically bounded wireframe provides the capability to represent the shape of a product by three-dimensional wireframe models whose curves are geometrically bounded.
The conformance option Manifold subsurface provides the capability to
The conformance option Manifold surface provides the capability to
The conformance option Materials provides the capability to identify materials and to represent the chemical composition, material properties and surface characteristics of products.
The conformance option Mechanical design geometric presentation provides the capability for the representation of the visual presentation of the shape of mechanical design models.
The conformance option Mechanical design presentation representation with draughting provides the capability for the representation of a styled model for mechanical design presentation which is composed of draughting models and other mechanical design style models.
The conformance option Mechanical design shaded presentation provides the capability for the representation of advanced visual presentations of the shape of mechanical design models.
The conformance option Modified swept solid provides the capability to
The conformance option Multi linguism provides the capability to represent names and description of objects in different languages. In addition alternative names can be provided.
The conformance option Non manifold surface provides the capability to
The conformance option Part make from relationship provides the capability to
The conformance option Partial document and structured text representation provides the capability to represent structured tagged text as content of a document and to refer to portions of this text.
The conformance option Person and organization provides the capability to define persons, organization and addresses and to relate the combination of those to Parts and other objects in a particular role.
Example: The person "Fred Flintstone" who is an employee from the organization "Stone Times Inc." is the "creator" of version "v1" of the part "Stone Vehicle One".
The conformance option Physical and functional breakdown provides the capability for the partitioning of a product into a set of related functional and physical elements.
The conformance option Planned and evaluated characteristics provides the capability to
The conformance option Product class and specification provides the capability for the representation of the identification and characterization of families of similar products to be offered to the market and to identify particular member of the family of products with selected characteristics.
The conformance option Product concept provides the capability for the representation of the identification of a product or a family products proposed to customers.
The conformance option Product configuration provides the capability to represent design information that is related with selected characteristic elements and their conditional combination of family of products offered to market.
The conformance option Product version relationship provides the capability to define sequences, hierarchies and derivations between versions of the same or different products and to record the fact that two versions of different products are intended to be the same.
The conformance option Production rule provides the capability for the representation of the information needed to describe design constraints, commonly referred to as rules.
The conformance option Requirement provides the capability to
The conformance option Saved view provides the capability to store camera positions of three dimensional styles models together with selected appearance styles and annotations.
The conformance option Security classification provides the capability to
The conformance option Shape feature provides the capability for the representation of a shape oriented shape_feature, either defined in place or alternately by placing a referenced shape_feature.
The conformance option Shape validation property provides the capability for the representation of shape validation properties, including centre point, volume, surface and moment of inertia.
The conformance option Shell based wireframe provides the capability to represent the shape of a product by three-dimensional wireframe models whose curves are bounded by a set of shells.
The conformance option Software provides the capability to represent software as a product with versions and to identify the sources, object and other files for this software.
The conformance option Solid with local modification provides the capability to represent the shape of a product by a three dimensional modified solid with local changes. The types of modification permitted include edge based modifications, face based modifications and the introduction of depressions, protrusions of different shapes and regular patterns of these features.
The conformance option Procedural solid model provides the capability to represent the shape of a product by a three dimensional solid that is created by procedural modifications of another solid.
The conformance option Solutions for physical and functional breakdown provides the capability to to represent occurrences of parts as realized solutions for a functional or organic requirement and also to provide alternative solutions.
The conformance option Specification control provides the capability for the representation of products with a large number of variants.
The conformance option Swept solid provides the capability to represent the shape of a product by three dimensional solids that are created by sweeping a face.
The conformance option Text with specified font provides the capability to represent text together with detailed stroke and outline font.
The conformance option Thickened face solid provides the capability to represent the shape of a product by a three dimensional solid created by thickening a face. The face is topologically bounded and has fully defined geometry. The material added may be on one, or both, sides of the original face.
The conformance option Work organization provides the capability to represent a work request to perform particular kinds of activities for an identified set of items and to represent a work order by which the work request is authorized to be addressed.
&comimfile;
